nodes.name: AbacusKernel

nodes.documentation: @dev Opens an escrow account between two parties.
nodes.name: openEscrow

nodes.documentation: @dev Closes escrow account and transfers ABA to appropriate party
nodes.name: closeEscrow

nodes.documentation: @dev Revokes an escrow agreement, either due to cancellation or expiry
nodes.name: revokeEscrow

nodes.documentation: @dev Requests a service from the given service provider.
nodes.name: requestAsyncService

nodes.documentation: @dev Locks escrow account for an Async Service Request
nodes.name: acceptAsyncServiceRequest

nodes.documentation: @dev Revokes an Async Service Request. This will only succeed if escrow account is open or expired.
nodes.name: revokeAsyncServiceRequest
onAsyncServiceCompleted
